Course Resources

The documents below contain resources that are used throughout this course. You can download the PDF to share digitally or in print form. You might share these resources with parents and (high school) students. You might also print them to place somewhere for your own recall. If there is anything you would like to save for later, please make sure to do it now. You will lose access to this course 30 days after completion.
